dialogue.name: JANNEQUINARD
dialogue.text: Greetings and welcome to the Athenaeum Astrologicum. Perhaps you were drawn by fate to this place of learning─or perhaps you wish to know more of fate itself?

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: Do you wish to know more of fate?

dialogue.name: JANNEQUINARD
dialogue.text: Then you were wise to come hither. For in the stars are written the fates of every woman and man on Hydaelyn.

dialogue.name: JANNEQUINARD
dialogue.text: So you say, yet here you are. You need only learn to open your eyes and see the answers which lie above us in the boundless firmament.

dialogue.name: JANNEQUINARD
dialogue.text: It was there in the stars that I read a womanman would call upon the Athenaeum this very day. A womanman who would play an important role in my own life.

dialogue.name: JANNEQUINARD
dialogue.text: Ah, but my apologies. Even the most skilled reader cannot scry a name from the heavens. Would you be so kind as to give me yours, so that I might know who is to be my newest protégé?

dialogue.name: Q2
dialogue.text: Give Jannequinard your name and become his protégé?

dialogue.name: JANNEQUINARD
dialogue.text: Forename. Well... I was not expecting that. But what is a name, but an attempt by our begetters to wield power over the lives of their sons and daughters? Lives whose paths have already been foretold! In a sense, that is.

dialogue.name: JANNEQUINARD
dialogue.text: My name is Jannequinard de Durendaire and I am an astrologian for the Holy See. Remember that name, for it shall echo forevermore in the annals of Ishgardian history. Well...it will once I put it there. Once we put it there!

dialogue.name: JANNEQUINARD
dialogue.text: Well...er... That was awkward. It would not be entirely true if I said this was the first time my offer had been spurned today... But Twelve be damned, I was certain you were the womanman from my vision!
